programme.desc: House Pest: When Miss Croner finds termites have infested her home, she moves in with the chipmunks and drives everyone crazy.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Mr Krabs resorts to desperate measures after Plankton drives away his customers in 'Free Samples', and then in 'Home Sweet Rubble', SpongeBob's pineapple is falling apart, and needs re-modelling.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton's computer wife Karen ends up working at the Krusty Krab after being replaced by a newer model in 'Karen 2.0', and in 'InSPONGEiac', SpongeBob can't get to sleep, and asks Patrick to help.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln starts spending time at Clyde's house in 'Attention Deficit', and then in 'Out On A Limo', Lincoln wins a ride in a limo and starts to change after soaking up the good life. (S1, ep 16)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln signs his family up for a talent show and they form a band in 'House Music', then in 'A Novel Idea', it's Dad's Take Your Daughter to Work Day so Mom takes Lincoln to her office. (S1, ep 17)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: The Chipmunks argue over who is best suited to lead them to victory in 'Mutiny', then in 'Reality or Not', Alvin is tired of seeing his celebrity status overshadowed by Reality TV stars. (S1, ep 22)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin tells Theodore that he can turn rubbish into sweets in 'Alvin's Secret Powers', then in 'Warbie', The Chipmunks find a baby bird that's fallen from its nest. (S1, ep 24)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Why You Buggin'?: After discovering that Link's ex-girlfriend is a secret supervillain who wants Link for herself, Phoebe enlists Max's help in exposing her rival's true motives. (S3, ep 3)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Exit Stage Theft: Max tries to reestablish his evil cred with petty crimes, but when his best friends become a target, he must choose between them and his reputation. (S3, ep 4)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: The Time Jerker: When Kid Danger and Captain Man battle the Time Bandit, Kid Danger accidentally falls into the Time Bandit's time machine and relives the same day over again. (S2, ep 6)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Text, Lies, & Video: When a video of Henry and Ray transforming into Kid Danger and Captain Man gets out, Henry must get it back so that his secret identity isn't revealed. (S2, ep 12)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: The Patrick Show sells merchandise in 'The Patrick Show Cashes In', then in 'The Star Games', Patrick hosts a series of game shows. (S2, ep 1)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lana struggles to leave her pets behind for the weekend in 'Pet Project', and in 'Cuff Break', after Lincoln tests a magic trick on Grouse, they get handcuffed together. (S9, ep 4)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes a manga character to life in 'Prime Meridian Love', then in 'Stanky Danky', Hazel wishes up a trash monster. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: WhoBob WhatPants?: SpongeBob gets a bump on the bonce and can't remember who he is. His friends back in Bikini Bottom, who once told him to get lost, soon find they're missing him.

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: The Thunder Games - Part 1: Max and Phoebe advance to the final tryout for a spot on an elite superhero squad. (S4, ep 12)

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: A Young Mystery: When teenage versions of Taylor's mum and her Uncle Charlie materialise at Taylor's house, the gang must figure out how to reverse the phenomenon. (S1, ep 15)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Space Invaders, Part 2: Captain Man & Kid Danger discover who has taken the astronauts hostage. After realizing the astronauts are not so innocent, their alleigances change. (S3, ep 13)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Double Date Danger: When Miss Shapen's niece comes into town and chooses Jasper over Henry, Henry discovers that she has bigger plans than just going out to dinner with Jasper. (S3, ep 14)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Cheer and Present Danger: Phoebe and Cherry's friendship is put to the test after only one of them makes the cheerleading squad. Max wins a contest for a month of free pizza. (S2, ep 2)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Change of Art: Billy helps with Phoebe's art project, to find that he took the piece from a museum. Now they must work with Max to sneak in and return it before anyone notices. (S2, ep 4)

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: Power Problems Part 1: Danger Force's superpowers are on the fritz. Some new friends at a popular seafood restaurant provide free food and pirate hospitality to keep their spirits high. (S2, ep 10)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: A Film By Dale Squires: When a hot young filmmaker comes to Hollywood Arts, the kids are excited to work on his project. But when the film is released, the kids want revenge. (S1, ep 9)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: My Art Will Go On: Does being an artist make you popular? Julie joins the Art Club in order to befriend a cool art kid, but ends up being challenged to make her art more personal. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry & the Woodpeckers: When Piper's basketball coach quits, Henry becomes the coach of Piper's team. (S2, ep 4)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Captain Man Goes on Vacation: Ray has trusted Henry and Charlotte with protecting Swellview while he's out of town at his cousin's wedding. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Stealing Home: Hank and Phoebe think the house has been robbed when they discover the furniture missing, but Max admits he hid everything and forces them to earn it all back. (S3, ep 24)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Back to School: Back in elementary school to complete a hero assessment, Phoebe & Max realize that it won't be easy when the instructor is a former classmate that Max tormented. (S3, ep 20)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Beck's Big Break: Tori accidentally gets Beck fired from a small role in a movie, then must find a way to get him his job back. Meanwhile, Robbie has nightmares about Rex. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Jade Dumps Beck: Jade dumps Beck, then regrets it and recruits Tori to help get him back. Meanwhile, Trina puts on a show and tells Robbie to give it a good review, or else! (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Popularity Papers
programme.desc: Pain in the Bat Mitzvah: Lydia's Bat Mitzvah is coming up, which means this is her opportunity to invite all the popular kids to her grand, out of this world party! (S1, ep 13)

programme.desc: High Voltage Bear Attack: The lemmings are having a party, but when Grizzy throws their ghetto blaster into the river he sparks a power cut! (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Baby Brother Blues: When Beth is told that the impending arrival of a baby brother is about to ruin her life, she runsaway to find a new family. (S2 Ep37)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Snack To The Future: Owen wants his favourite treat, 'Jiggle Giggle', so bad that he's uses a time machine to get to snack time quicker. (S2 Ep40)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Me, My Elf, And I: Duncan tricks Chef into taking the class to the North Pole to remove his name from the naughty list. (S2 Ep41)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Bad Seed: Chef introduces the kids to agriculture by teaching them how to grow plants from seeds. But when Izzy shows her seed too much love, it turns into a monster! (S2 Ep44)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Fish Called Leshawna: After eating some mystery fish sticks, Leshawna achieves every little girl's dream and transforms into a mermaid! (S2 Ep45)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Encore'tney: When Courtney turns to a magical datebook to help her achieve perfection, she's trapped in a never-ending loop until a friend teaches her a valuable lesson. (S2 Ep48)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Life Of Pie: When Izzy, Jude and Owen accidentally bring a pizza to life they do everything they can to help it find a new purpose in life, other than being eaten. (S2 Ep49)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: School District 9: When a career-predicting machine tells Owen he has no skills to offer the world, Owen finds a way to prove the machine wrong in the most Owen way possible. (S2 Ep52)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Eole Crash: Manta challenges Corto to a no holds barred race in the Hive. Corto accepts the challenge despite Mouse's warnings about the risks of this course. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The Perfume: A bottle of Xin Qi's favorite perfume brings fond memories till a Shard ruins it. A spritz makes victims ADORE the first person they see. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: New: Jade Armor
programme.desc: Jade-Con: When the Crimson Lord locks fans in a comic convention, most think it's an Escape Room but L.J. knows it's no game! (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Frightningale: Ladybug faces a young singer who's turned into Frightningale. (S2 Ep8)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Gabriel Agreste: Marinette sneaks into the Agreste home during a private dinner, only to find out that a supervillain is also crashing the party. (S4 Ep9)

programme.title: New: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: Rush Crushed Kid: Luke gets challenged by Yosh the Overcrusher - a muscle-bound, masked behemoth from the wasteland! (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: An Egg-stremely Bad Idea: Hoping to 'brighten her day,' Izzy and Owen revamp Gwen's egg chair. (S2 Ep5)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Exercising The Demons: When a severe screen addiction makes the kids lazy, Chef brings in a professional to whip them into shape. (S2 Ep6)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Pudding The Planet First: After Chef says opposing viewpoints make the world more interesting and fun, Izzy applies it in the worst way possible. (S2 Ep7)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Supply Mum: When Chef's mum becomes the supply teacher for a day, Duncan replaces Chef's to-do list with one of his own. (S2 Ep8)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Mooshy Mon Mons: After eating Chef's extremely rare and expensive chocolates, Courtney drags Owen, Izzy and Beth all the way to the Norberian Alps of Fruffenberg to replace them. (S2 Ep9)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Student Becomes The Teacher: Chef is knocked unconscious right before a school board evaluator shows up for a big review. Now Owen has to fill in so Chef doesn't lose his teaching licence. (S2 Ep10)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Beth And The Beanstalk: After having a chocolate bar confiscated by Chef, Beth finds herself in a parallel giant world and aims to get back her now giant chocolate bar. (S2 Ep11)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The A-bok-bok-bokalypse: When chicken pox sweeps through the school, the kids visit the Chicken Queen to apologise for past misdeeds and hopefully procure an antidote before it's too late! (S2 Ep12)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: Rush Crushed Kid: Luke gets challenged by Yosh the Overcrusher - a muscle-bound, masked behemoth from the wasteland! (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: Show it Goku! The Power of the Super Saiyan God!!: Holding the powers of a Super Saiyan God, Goku tries to face Beerus. Goku proves to be a true challenge. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Bearly Edible: After eating snacks meant for everyone and replacing them with disgusting low budget cookies from Barfvomita, Owen is full of guilt and tries to make things right. (S3 Ep32)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Not for the Paint of Heart: When Izzy believes that Chef wants her to "Rise to the Challenge" of destroying the daycare with art, she gets some magic paint to bring her creations to life. (S3 Ep33)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Daycare of Rock: After believing he's turned Chef to stone Duncan sets his sights on ultimate chaos only to discover there's no joy in victory without an adversary. (S3 Ep34)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Tree Stooges Save Christmas - Part 1: The kids accidentally destroy Chef's decorated Christmas tree. So they go on an epic mission to replace his holiday treasures. (S3 Ep35)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Tree Stooges Save Christmas PT2: The kids accidentally destroy Chef's decorated Christmas tree. So they go on an epic mission to replace his holiday treasures. (S3 Ep36)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Aches & Ladders: When MacArthur has a bad fall in the school, the kids' recollections of the event are just as weird as they are. (S3 Ep37)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Cactus Makes Perfect: Cody's friends become concerned when he forms a new friendship with a cactus. (S3 Ep38)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Virtual Reality Bites: When the school switches to virtual reality, Harold uses the opportunity to get the respect he feels he rightfully deserves. (S3 Ep39)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: WaterHose-Five: It's the hottest day of the year and a broken air conditioner leads to a water battle of epic proportions to determine who controls the garden hose. (S3 Ep13)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Cody the Barbarian: Cody is set to inherit a video game empire from his long lost uncle, but only if he and his friends have what it takes to conquer a fantastical live action video game. (S3 Ep14)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: TP2: Judgement Bidet: When the city experiences a toilet paper shortage, Beth and Harold investigate and discover it's their old rival Sewer Mike who is the mastermind behind it all. (S3 Ep15)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dial B for Birder: Harold uncovers a secret plot that Chef's new parrot is hatching and tries to save his teacher, only to discover that Sugar figured it out before him. Or did she? (S3 Ep16)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Hole Lot of Trouble: When rain derails an outside game of catch, someone suggests they play inside. This prompts Izzy to lead the group through her wildly imaginative worst case scenario. (S3 Ep17)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Arakno Race: The Tikis have been sabotaged! Team Pirate is blamed and black-listed, with Mouse as sole ally...Until Corto discovers the actual culprits. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Rock 'N' Rolla Coaster Race: Unsettled by the Tao Twin's skills - and by their charming captain, Corto tries to boost Maroro with an ancient Aqua relic... (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.desc: Bear Gliding: The Lemmings kite surf with a homemade kite. Grizzy decides to make a kite that is far more sophisticated than the Lemmings' kite to win she-bear's affection. (S1 Ep37)

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae Coedwig hardd yr Olobobs yn llawn sbwriel! A all Tib, Lalw a Bobl ddarganfod pwy yw'r troseddwr a datrys pethe? The Olobobs discover giant-sized litter all over their beautiful forest!

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Digbi yn darllen stori am 'Folant Fagddu' pan mae'n clywed swn rhuo y tu allan. Digbi is reading a story about a battle against 'Folant Fagddu' when he hears a roar outside.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Pam bod pethau'n arnofio?'. Dyna mae Ela am wybod heddiw. Mae gan Tad-cu stori sili arall i'w rannu am bysgod anweledig. Today, Tadcu is on hand to tell a silly story about invisible fish.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod cyntaf yr haf ac mae pawb yn edrych ymlaen at ddathlu. It's the first day of summer and everyone's looking forward to the celebration party.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: New: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn ffeindio be' ma nhw'n feddwl yw seren goll ar y traeth ac yn ceisio'i dychwelyd i'r awyr. The Woohoos find what they think is a fallen star on the beach and try to return it.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Sin yn cytuno codi arian i warchodfa asynnod drwy redeg ras noddedig. A fydd cyngor Sid, sy'n rhedwr profiadol, yn ei helpu? Sin agrees to take part in a sponsored run for donkeys.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Arloeswyr Pontypandy yn trio ennill bathodynnau adeiladu raft. Ond mae charjyr diffygiol Jams yn achosi tan. The Pontypandy pioneers are trying to win badges for building a raft.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Pan mae criw o nadroedd gwenwynig yn cael eu darganfod yn sownd ar draeth, rhaid i Pegwn a'r Octonots eu hebrwng yn l i'r cefnfor. Pegwn has to get some poisonous snakes back to the sea.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae'r gadwyn wedi torri ar feic Harri - lwcus mai i weithdy trwsio beics mae o'n mynd heddiw. The chain on Harri's bike has broken - lucky that he is going to a bike repair workshop today.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae Baba Melyn yn brysur tu hwnt heddiw; mae bron pawb eisiau cot o baent ond does ganddi ddim amser i baentio pawb. Who can help Baba Melyn give everyone a coat of paint today?

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae gan Digbi gyfeiriwr newydd sbon ac mae'n awyddus iawn i weld pa mor dda mae'n gweithio. Digbi has a new Direction Finder he's desperate to try out. A sudden fog-fall gives him a chance.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Er bod ei chwiorydd yn gwneud hwyl am ei ben, mae Deio'r hwyaden wrth ei fodd yn darllen llyfrau. Hurrah! Deio the duck finds a new friend who loves books as much as he does.

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Ar l adeiladu castell eira yn y mynyddoedd oer, mae'r Abadas yn ymuno Ben i chwarae 'gm y geiriau'. After building a snow castle in the snowy mountains, the Abadas play the word game.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae Harmoni, Melodi a Bop yn cael hwyl yn dringo i ben y mynydd. Mae cymaint i'w weld a'i arogli yma. Harmoni, Melodi and Bop have the best time climbing to the top of the mountain.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Blero am gael perfformio yng nghyngerdd Ocido felly mae'n rhaid dysgu chwarae offeryn! Blero and friends are to take part in a concert but first they must learn to play an instrument!

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc, a chath yn coginio cacen! Welcome to a new series of Jambor!

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Rhaid i Joni ddysgu i lanhau os am gael ymuno gyda'i deulu yn y sioe awyr, a hynny heb dwyllo. Joni must learn to clean and clear if he wants to be able to join his family in the air show.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Ifor Hael sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! The challenge is to collect as many clean teeth as possible and win the Dani Dant Trophy!

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae pawb yng Nghoedwig yr Olobob yn gyffrous i glywed Norbet yn dweud jcs yn ei Sioe Ddigri, ond mae'r gynulleidfa yn anodd ei phlesio! Can the Olobobs help Norbet find his funny bone?

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Digbi'n gobeithio mai dyma ei flwyddyn i ennill 'Y Ras Fawr'! Digbi hopes that this is his year to win 'The Great Race'! But Glenys tells Teifion that she must win the race.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Ar l trip i'r sw mae Jamal eisiau gwybod 'Beth oedd yr anifail cyntaf erioed?' Tadcu reels out a silly story about a tortoise by the name of Darwen, the only animal that lived on earth!

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae 'na ben-blwydd arall yn yr harbwr heddiw - pen-blwydd yr harbwr ei hun. There's another birthday celebration at the harbour today - it's the harbour's birthday!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back, with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn deffro ar fore niwlog a'n meddwl bod Ynys Ddoeth wedi codi i'r cymylau. The Woohoos wake up on a foggy morning and think Wise Island has floated up into the clouds.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Sin yn perswadio Mario i roi cynnig ar fersiwn iachus o un o'i hoff fwydydd. Sin persuades Mario to try a healthy version of his favourite dish.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Siarlys a Sam wedi mynd i ffwrdd am benwythnos dawel i Ynys Pontypandy, ond dyw'r profiad ddim mor "dawel" a hynny. Sam and Siarlys go away for a quiet weekend to Pontypandy Island.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae Dela yn cael cymorth ei chwaer fach i ddatrys dirgelwch diflaniad rhyfedd mewn coedwig wymon. Dela teams up with her little sister to solve a mysterious disappearance in a kelp forest.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Daw galwad gan Gareth Potter y DJ a Lloyd - o na! mae eu seinyddion wedi torri. A call comes in from DJ Gareth Potter and Lloyd. Harri's help is needed as Gareth's speakers are broken.

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau

programme.desc: Ma'r efeillaid yn edrych ymlaen i fwyta crempog, ond ma 'na greadur bach arall sydd yn awyddus i fwyta eu brecwast, pry cop o'r enw Prys! A spider called Prys is after the twins' pancakes!
